regen.absent_element: reception of command and control information acknowledgement from the AV
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall receive and confirm acknowledgement of command and control information from the AV via the downlink

regen.absent_element: handling of link loss or failure during Beyond Line Of Sight operation
regen.new_specification: The system shall have a mechanism to handle and recover from link loss or failure during Beyond Line Of Sight operation, ensuring continued control and monitoring functionality of the AV.

regen.absent_element: reception of telemetry and payload data processing
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall process the received telemetry and payload data from the AV via the downlink for monitoring and control purposes.

label: The TCS shall receive AV telemetry and payload information via downlink from the AV
absence: action of receiving data via downlink from the AV
